meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nervous or easily agitated.
meanings.sent1: Her nerviness showed when she couldn't sit still during the exam.
meanings.sent2: His nerviness was evident as he fidgeted with his hands.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nerviness around strangers made it hide under the bed.
meanings.sent4: The nerviness in the air before the storm was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The nerviness in her voice revealed her anxiety.

meanings.definition: Boldness or audacity in behavior or attitude.
meanings.sent1: I admire her nerviness in speaking up for what she believes in.
meanings.sent2: His nerviness in challenging the status quo was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's nerviness in stealing food from the picnic amused the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The nerviness of the young entrepreneur to start her own business was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: His nerviness on the stage captivated the audience.
